content.rendered: This project aimed to bring together children from the ten regions of Cameroon to mutualize their effort and to voice out for the construction of peace in Cameroon in general and in the affected regions by war in support to the government and endeavors. The project contributed to build directly and indirectly the capacity of 1000 children from the 10 regions of Cameroon: Extreme North, North; South West, North West, West, Adamaoua, East, Littoral, South and Centre Region of Cameroon in peacebuilding; children online Children Terrorism.  Children have led Several advocates for the implementation of the UNSCR 2250 and the fully implication of children in peacebuilding in Cameroon made towards stakeholders and decision makers. A Children “United4Peace” Caravan and march mobilizing 200 children have been organized as part of this project.
